programme.title: MST3K: Blood Waters Of Dr. Z
programme.desc: Seeking revenge against those responsible for stripping him of his tenure and the denial of human research subjects, Dr. Z mutates himself into a half-human-half-fish-like creature!

programme.title: To The Devil...A Daughter
programme.desc: An excommunicated priest leads a gang of satanists who plan on using a young woman as the representative of the Devil on Earth.

programme.title: Devil's Playground (2010)
programme.desc: As the world succumbs to a zombie apocalypse, a hardened mercenary chases someone who can provide a cure.

programme.title: Forbidden World
programme.desc: Part Alien... Part Human... All Nightmare!

programme.title: Chiller
programme.desc: When a group of friends hold a seance in the basement of a London cafe they each receive a prophecy. Five years later and the prophecies have started to come true, but who made them?

programme.title: Chiller
programme.desc: Ray and Louise Knight tragically lose Toby, their unborn baby, in a car accident. Although Louise has not made love since the accident, she soon discovers she's pregnant again.

programme.title: Chiller
programme.sub-title: Chiller: S1 E3 - Here Comes The Mirror Man
programme.desc: A social worker takes on a disturbed down and out but may have cause to regret it as her predecessor was murdered in mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: Chiller
programme.sub-title: Chiller: S1 E4 - The Man Who Didn't Believe In Ghosts
programme.desc: Richard Cramer, a professional de-bunker of the paranormal, moves into Windwhistle Hall with his family, only to they find themselves involved in a series of unexplained events and accidents.

programme.title: Chiller
programme.desc: Jack Taylor is the homicide detective investigating the murders of five children. Aware that the serial killer is likely to strike for the sixth time, he discovers a connection to an ancient Druidic site.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre (1982)
programme.desc: When Trish (Michele Michaels) decides to invite her teammates over for a slumber party, she has no idea the night is going to end with an unexpected guest.

programme.title: MST3K: The Mask
programme.desc: For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D!

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Terror
programme.desc: Elvira mocks Roger Corman classic "The Terror" until she falls asleep.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000
programme.sub-title: MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come
programme.desc: Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

programme.title: Raptor
programme.desc: This direct-to-video variation on Jurassic Park tells the story of small-town sheriff and an animal expert discovering what has been causing a series of mysterious mutilations.

programme.title: Evilspeak
programme.desc: An outcast military cadet taps into a way to summon demons and cast spells on his tormentors through his computer.

programme.title: The Antichrist [Italian-Language Version]
programme.desc: A paralyzed young woman becomes possessed by the Devil when a hypnosis session accidentally awakens memories of her past life as a witch.
